post.body: black russian, let it never be said I'm not a bad influnce :-D
I just have twirl running on the other screen whilst I play WoW, I also have WoW windowed so it's easy to switch between the 2
no just a nutter of a history student
A friend of mine did his dissertation on folklore and gaming.
nah, not unless you particularly want me to, I'm happy spending it on my own.
lol perks of being single students I guess :-D
me & @xiavn used to live together & play all you would hear is us shouting obcenities, instructions & questions across the flat
aye despite our 3 cats our garden is crawling with birdies nomming from our various feeders.
Oh dear been one of those shifts has it?
Yeah they will be, maybe I can treat you to somthing when I get back to Leicester. I can at least cook something half decent :-)
awww bless are you going to have something decent for dinner or is that it?
thanks :-) currently twiddling my thumbs at The Boy's waiting
hehe I know, I have no understanding of the concept "packing light" I will be away for almost 2 weeks, it's so too much tho
lol just to stay with @xiavn for xmas, then house-stiting The Boy's, then back to @xiavn 's for New Year.
Yay, I can go back to bed. ZZZzzzzz..
Is helping with this essay & then collapsing back in bed. Drug induced sleep is no kind of sleep.
Have woken up because of two texts at once, now about to proof read @xiavns essay, brain is mush, I can't even see, had rubbish sleep.
Trying to cry quietly so my mum doesn't hear, and not let this turn into an asthma attack or be sick.
Going straight to bed, Dad's really angry because the kittens got in his office, despite the fact he left the door open, it really upse...
Bed and a book is feelin like a good idea atm, however laptop would be coming with me, going to go downstairs see if we have any decent...
has just remembered tonight is Guild Wars night with @xiavn & Ross
I just joined the guildwars Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/guildwars and you can too. Please Retweet.
Thinking about it, having xmas to myself could be cool, I can slob about in my PJ's all day and curl up with a tub of ice cream & a book.
The Boy is letting me stay at his at xmas, he won't be there but it means I won't have to spend it with my family, thank G-d.
Yay, just worked out I get to spend a lonely miserable new year right after a lonely miserable Christmas. I hate this time of year.
omg lebkuchen sooooooo good...
Accidentally ate meat, was given quiche unknowingly containing some, feel sick, but can't throw up my gag reflex has been desensitis...
Is waiting for xmas dinner...
can smell food and is hungry
just brought herself Jade Empire for an xmas pressie, but it probably won't arrive until my birthday, knowing the post at this time o...
*is cold*
Just woken up, it's xmas day here in Blighty, missing The Boy.
Have concluded my travelling for today, here until after xmas.
Getting reading for interview hoped I've remembered to pack everything.
Oh and I remembered my corset, that was the first thing I packed.
Is it wrong I made sure I packed my juggling balls, poi, jewellery, false eyelashes & suspenders but left everything else to chance?
Has done all the packing she can until tomorrow morning. I need a drink (no not the alcoholic kind)
Is just throwing things in a suitcase, which is very unlike me. Oh well it's going to be a week of random outfits.
I am taking the big suitcase, this is justified by the fact I'll be away more than a week.
Trying to decide whether to attempt to pack light & take my small suitcase or rucksack or go for broke & pack the big one.
